page.title: 06TRANSPORT
page.content: { MOTORWAY SURVEY, TRAVEL, TRAFFIC.} We asked about 50 people to take part in a survey about the use of M5 junction 5. We found that 59% used this junction occasionally,32% often,19% everyday.When using this junction 77% travelled north,23% south.38% used the motorway for visiting,32% for travelling to work,19% for going on holiday and 11% shopping.79% preferred using the motorway because it was faster,13% because it was safer and 8% did not like using it.Boredom was considered to be the biggest hazard at 47%,speed at 38% and overuse 16%.The speed limit on a motorway is 70 mph.61% thought this was suitable, 21% thought it should be less and 18% would like to see the speed limit increased.
